name: Girl Shopping For Party
description: Girl Shopping For Party is a fun-filled beauty shopping and makeup game.Hi!Beauties!Do you like the princess?She is going to hold a big party tomorrow,she wants to become the most wonderful girl,but she finds that she doesn't have suitable skirts,she needs to buy beautiful dress and cosmetics,boots and jewelry,and then she will make a good hairstyle.So are you ready to help her?Come and start your game!
